alert.note: Alert for Orange (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS New York City - Upton (Long Island and New York City)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 05 at 2:27PM EDT by NWS New York City - Upton
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Orange County through 315 PM EDT... At 226 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Middletown, moving east at 5 mph. HAZARD...Pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Middletown, Goshen, Howells, Chester, Florida, Scotchtown, Mechanicstown, Maybrook, Slate Hill, Circleville and New Hampton. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
